subject: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Beneficiary
we write to notify you that you have been approved as one of those to
be paid part payment of their overdue fund
We have been given world bank grant
to disburse to our foreign/local beneficiaries whose debt has been
long overdue
To this end, the sum of $2M has been Approved for immediate Release to
you via ATM Mastercard
This is in line with the directive given to us by the World Bank to
ensure that the rightful beneficiaries get paid
Awaiting your prompt response
Dr.Goodman Martins
Payment Commission

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Martins,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate the notification about being approved for part payment of an overdue fund. Can you please provide me with more details about the World Bank grant and how it works? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear William

We acknowledge your response to our last email notifying you about your
Approved part sum which will be released to you as soon as you reconfirmed
your details

Our paying Bank has been instructed to process your fund

You are required to email your contact address, phone number and a copy of
your ID which is required for your account opening/ATM Card issuance

We apologize for our delayed response as pur Commission went on Break which
we just reconvene this week

Kindly email the requested info to enable our Paying Bank to process your
payment

Dr Goodman Martins

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Goodman Martins,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approved part sum. I appreciate the update and instructions provided. Could you please confirm which bank will be processing the payment? Additionally, do you have an estimated timeline for when the funds will be released once I provide the requested information?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Williams

Your mail was received. However, regarding your question about the
timeline, it varies, it can take minimum of 7 working days to maximum 14
working days

We are paying you from our Thailand paying bank, our previous referrals did
not exceed 10 days

Your payment is in the third and last batch of the payment, we have
completed first and second batches

You should enclose the requested info to facilitate your funds release

Awaiting your prompt response

Dr Goodman Martins

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Goodman Martins,

Thank you for the information regarding the payment timeline and the batch process. Could you please clarify what specific information is required to facilitate the release of funds? I want to ensure that everything is in order on my end.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Williams,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the payment process. Could you please clarify what specific information is required to facilitate the release of funds? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Goodman Martins,

Thank you for the information regarding the payment timeline and the batch process. Could you please clarify what specific information is required to facilitate the release of funds? I want to ensure that everything is in order for a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Goodman Martins,

Thank you for your email and the information provided regarding the payment timeline. I appreciate your prompt response.

Could you please clarify what specific information is required to facilitate the release of funds? I want to ensure that everything is in order from my end.

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Goodman Martins,

Thank you for your email and the information provided regarding the payment timeline. I appreciate the update on the payment process and the clarification about the batches.

Could you please confirm what specific information is required to facilitate the release of funds? I want to ensure that everything is in order from my end.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
William
